TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebManagementEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent

summary.span: 定義包含應用程式和處理序資訊之事件的基底類別。

span.span: Defines the base class for events that carry application and process information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如所有 ASP.NET 健康監視事件類型的基底類別。The is the base class for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它會使用類別來取得其衍生的類別都能使用的處理程序資訊。It uses the class to obtain process information that is available to its derived classes. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作自訂的事件從類別。The following example shows how to implement a custom event by deriving it from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/CS/webmanagementevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/VB/webmanagementevent.vb#1)] 以下是摘錄自組態檔可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂的事件。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

para.span: 格式化時顯示您自訂事件的資訊，覆寫方法而非方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

para.span: 事件代碼，您指定您的自訂事件必須是大於。

span.span: The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

summary.span: 取得關於 ASP.NET 應用程式裝載處理序的資訊。
